ass_menu_is_massive_desc: Make the mod do the thing.
ass_menu_level_mod_desc: Make levels use a fixed response faction on any difficulty. Disabled in Holdout.
ass_menu_assault_style_desc: Choose between original styled and Streamlined Heisting styled spawn groups.
ass_menu_skill_desc: Tweaks base values used for scaling.
ass_menu_marshal_squads_allowed_desc: Adjust how many Marshal groups can be present at the same time.
ass_menu_max_values_desc: Sets values that scale with chosen difficulty to use Death Sentence values.
ass_menu_max_diff_desc: Always uses task data corresponding to 100% heist difficulty progression.
ass_menu_max_balance_muls_desc: Always uses enemy spawn limits corresponding to a full crew, regardless of how many players there are.
ass_menu_minigun_dozers_desc: Allow Minigun Dozers to spawn in the assault on Death Wish difficulty.
ass_menu_reset_settings_desc: Reset settings to the default for the next heist.
ass_menu_reset_settings_verify: Sure you wanna reset your settings?
ass_menu_did_not_find_sh:
Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups requires Streamlined Heisting.

Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups will deactivate itself until Streamlined Heisting is installed and the game is fully restarted.
